name: Drug Discovery Chemistry Europe 2024
content: Drug Discovery Chemistry is a dynamic conference and networking event for drug discovery scientists working in pharma, biotech, and academia. One of the few events that reflects the new cross-functional and collaborative nature of drug discovery, our speakers and attendees are comprised primarily of pharma and biotech scientists, as well as key academic thought leaders working in translational research. Discussions of chemical tools and approaches to meet the practical (not theoretical) challenges of drug discovery are front and center. Speakers from industry include: Amgen, Astex Pharmaceuticals, AstraZeneca, Boehringer Ingelheim, Bristol Myers Squibb, Chugai Pharmaceutical, Genentech, GSK, Johnson & Johnson, Merck, Novartis, Pfizer, Roche, UCB Pharma, and more.
